<br></br>

# Data Download

Data from this package comes from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, the Agency for Toxic Substances and Disease Registry, and the Geospatial Research, Analysis, and Services Program. Users can download the data at the following site: https://svi.cdc.gov/SVIDataToolsDownload.html

# Packages

Packages used can be found in the DESCRIPTION file. Users must have `rgdal` installed.
